alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:52AM CDT until June 13 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 551 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles southeast of Cloudy, or 30 miles northeast of Hugo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Wright City, Eagletown, Rufe, Glover, Hochatown, Ringold, Mount Herman and Sherwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
